articles.description: The Bolero gets a bigger hike than the Bolero Neo, not all variants are affected     Mahindra has hiked prices of the Bolero by up to Rs 31,000.    It’s now priced between Rs 9.78 lakh and Rs 10.79 lakh.    Prices of the Bolero Neo have been bumped up uniform…
articles.content:
The Bolero gets a bigger hike than the Bolero Neo, not all variants are affected
